solution_line_template: The rooms are full so there are currently {num_rooms} rooms * {people_per_room} people = <<{num_rooms}*{people_per_room}={total_people}>>{total_people} people in the hotel.
So the hotel hands out {total_people} people * {towels_per_person} towels = <<{total_people}*{towels_per_person}={total_towels}>>{total_towels} towels.
